Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.world

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.world.Island
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptTower, CanAcceptStudent
public class Island extends Object implements CanAcceptStudent, AcceptTower
Island class contains the attributes and the method to manage the Island of the Game, are considered Island both single Island and group of Island joined together.
